label: diagnosis at reporting facility, all treatment elsewhere
description: Initial diagnosis at the reporting facility AND all treatment or a decision not to treat was done ELSEWHERE

label: diagnosis at reporting facility or staff physician's office, part or all treatment at reporting facility
description: Initial diagnosis at the reporting facility or in a staff physician's office AND PART OR ALL of first course treatment or a decision not to treat was at the reporting facility, NOS

label: diagnosis at physician office, part treatment at reporting facility
description: Initial diagnosis in staff physician's office AND PART of first course treatment was done at the reporting facility

label: diagnosis at physician office, all treatment at reporting facility
description: Initial diagnosis in staff physician's office AND ALL first course treatment or a decision not to treat was done at the reporting facility

label: diagnosis at reporting facility, part treatment at reporting facility
description: Initial diagnosis at the reporting facility AND PART of first course treatment was done at the reporting facility

label: diagnosis at reporting facility, all treatment at reporting facility
description: Initial diagnosis at the reporting facility AND ALL first course treatment or a decision not to treat was done at the reporting facility

label: diagnosis elsewhere, part or all treatment at reporting facility, NOS
description: Initial diagnosis elsewhere AND PART OR ALL of first course treatment was done at the reporting facility, NOS

label: diagnosis elsewhere, part treatment at reporting facility
description: Initial diagnosis elsewhere AND PART of treatment was done at the reporting facility

label: diagnosis elsewhere, all treatment at reporting facility
description: Initial diagnosis elsewhere AND ALL first course treatment was done at the reporting facility

label: diagnosis and all treatment elsewhere, reporting facility participated in diagnostic workup
description: Initial diagnosis and all first course treatment elsewhere AND reporting facility participated in DIAGNOSTIC WORKUP (for example, consult only, staging workup after initial diagnosis elsewhere)

label: diagnosis and all treatment elsewhere, reporting facility provided in-transit care
description: Initial diagnosis and all first course treatment elsewhere AND reporting facility provided IN-TRANSIT care

label: diagnosis and all treatment elsewhere, patient presents at reporting facility with disease
description: Diagnosis AND all first course treatment provided elsewhere AND patient presents at reporting facility with disease RECURRENCE OR PERSISTENCE

label: diagnosis and all treatment elsewhere, patient presents at reporting facility with history
description: Diagnosis AND all first course treatment provided elsewhere AND patient presents at reporting facility with disease HISTORY ONLY

label: not required by CoC, diagnosis and part or all treatment at reporting facility
description: Type of case not required by CoC to be accessioned (for example, a benign colon tumor) AND initial diagnosis AND part or all of first course treatment by reporting facility

label: diagnosis before program's reference date, diagnosis and part or all treatment at reporting facility
description: Case diagnosed before program's Reference Date AND initial diagnosis AND PART OR ALL of first course treatment by reporting facility

label: not required by CoC, diagnosis elsewhere and part or all treatment at reporting facility
description: Type of case not required by CoC to be accessioned (for example, a benign colon tumor) AND initial diagnosis elsewhere AND part of all of first course treatment by reporting facility

label: diagnosis before program's reference date, diagnosis elsewhere and all or part treatment at reporting facility
description: Case diagnosed before program's Reference Date AND initial diagnosis elsewhere AND all or part of first course treatment by reporting facility

label: autopsy at reporting facility, not suspected prior to death
description: Initial diagnosis established by AUTOPSY at the reporting facility, cancer not suspected prior to death

label: diagnosis and all treatment at same physician office
description: Diagnosis AND all first course treatment given at the same staff physician's office

label: diagnosis and all treatment at different physician offices
description: Diagnosis and all first course treatment given in two or more different staff physician offices

label: not part of reporting facility
description: Non-staff physician or non-CoC accredited clinic or other facility, not part of reporting facility, accessioned by reporting facility for diagnosis and/or treatment by that entity (for example, hospital abstracts cases from an independent radiation facility)

label: pathology or lab specimens only
description: PATHOLOGY or other lab specimens ONLY

label: death certificate only
description: DEATH CERTIFICATE ONLY

label: unknown
description: Nonanalytic case of unknown relationship to facility (not for use by CoC accredited cancer programs for analytic cases.); UNKNOWN
